location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4429 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letter relating to a case of shipwreck, plunder and alleged murder off Yumail. Anderson writes that the Governor in Council approves of Jones’s proceedings.
